official-title.#text:
To prohibit any Federal agency or official, in carrying out any Act or program to reduce the
			 effects of greenhouse gas emissions on climate change, from imposing a fee
			 or tax on gaseous emissions emitted directly by livestock.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on

, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such
			 provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law, in carrying out any Act or program to reduce the
			 effects of greenhouse gas emissions on climate change, no Federal agency
			 or official shall impose a fee or tax on gaseous emissions emitted
			 directly by livestock.

header.#text: Prohibition of imposition of fee or tax on gaseous emissions by livestock

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4393 IH: To prohibit any Federal agency or official, in carrying out any Act or program to reduce the effects of greenhouse gas emissions on climate change, from imposing a fee or tax on gaseous emissions emitted directly by livestock.
